name: Sausage Pinball FREE
description:
"The World Needs More Sausage Pinball" - TouchArcade
"Only God Knows Where Does The Balls Go" - Appliv
**Top 1 Family Games Apps in Taiwan**

Media Reports:
Yahoo! Tech , AppleDaily , ETtoday , Apps Channel , iphonenews , Yipee , Applealmond , Axiang , Dacota , Briian

"Sausage Pinball" is suitable for adult, children, elders. Very easy and funny pinball game.

Sausage and Pinball brings on pure nostalgia to people from Taiwan. This is the ultimate childhood memory that combines fun and drooling over the world famous BBQ sausage.
There are many play modes, but the goal is simple: Win the game and eat the sausage!

This app is designed based on the real pinball machine and rule from BBQ sausage stand. I hope everyone can play this retro game on the phone everywhere and enjoy the old memories. Operation is fun and easy, it is suitable for family and friends together to play the game.

“Sausage Pinball” have 4 playing modes.

《Normal mode 1》
4 balls in total. Launch the ball and earn the sausages based on your total score.
To challenge the best score all over the world!

《Normal mode 2》
4 balls in total. Launch the ball and earn the sausages based on your total score.
To challenge the best score all over the world!

《Color mode》
5 balls in total. Launch the ball and earn the sausages based on your colors and positions.

《Challenge mode》
Unlimited balls. The total score can’t be 50, 100, 150, 200, 250. When your score is over 250, you will win in this level.
To challenge the best level all over the world!


[HOW TO PLAY]
1. Drag on the lower right corner and adjust the circle as power.
2. Release! The ball will be launched.


Have fun everybody!
